These service providers are bound by confidentiality agreements and are only authorized to use your information for the specified purposes.
We may also track certain aspects of the passive information received to improve Our marketing and analytics, and for this, We may share your information with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in delivering our services or performing essential business functions.

Depending on how You use Our Software or Services, We may also receive information from external applications that You use to access Our Software, or We may receive information through various web technologies, such as cookies, log files, clear gifs, web beacons or others.
The Company may provide You with certain information as a result of Your use of the Software or Services.
We may also track certain aspects of the passive information received to improve Our marketing and analytics, and for this, We may share your information with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in delivering our services or performing essential business functions.
When You register for an account, You provide Us with a valid email address and may provide Us with additional information, such as Your name, information about Your business or billing information.
When you choose to use Qadense's Zoom integration, we collect and process certain data for the sole purpose of facilitating the automatic registration of event participants within Qadense to the corresponding events on Zoom.

data_type: authorization edit meeting within administrator zoom account
text: Additionally, we request and obtain authorization to edit meetings and webinars within the event's administrator Zoom account.

Finally, we collect the event participants' name and email.
